description:
Moriko goes out to meet Koiwai, but he never shows up. Just as Moriko decides to give up and go home, she runs into Sakurai! Moriko finds out that she got the day of her day out with Koiwai wrong, and that Sakurai had been bothered by her turning down his previous invitation. What will she do now?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m So Embarrassed I Could Die!
恥ずか死んじゃいます!
